measured_by: Task-switching paradigm combining Stroop, dot-motion judgment, and flanker tasks
justification: "Cognitive effort entailed switching among Stroop, dot motion judgment, and flanker tasks. Task switching has previously been shown to impose subjective costs."

measured_by: Handgrip dynamometer task at 20 % maximum voluntary contraction
justification: "Participants exerted physical effort by gripping a handheld dynamometer… Gripping requirements in the physical effort condition were calibrated at 20 % of maximum voluntary contraction."

measured_by: Handgrip dynamometer task at 5 % maximum voluntary contraction
justification: "A fourth group experienced a low-effort physical task that required gripping above a negligible force level… the grip-force threshold was set to 5 %."

measured_by: Unfilled waiting period during the handling time
justification: "…each trial required physical effort, cognitive effort, or passive waiting for a set period of time (the 'handling time') in order to obtain the reward."
